UserInterface

Class StorageViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • UserInterface.StorageViewModel

  • public class StorageViewModel
extends java.lang.Object
    View Model class for binding the controller class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StorageViewModel(StorageModel storageModel)
      Basic constructor It also a listener declaration for the Storage Model class, waiting for "IncomingOrder" event to fire, and according to that updating the table in the GUI.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addProduct(int radioButtonType)
      This method is responsible for adding a product to the Storage by calling the addProduct method on the view model having the specific information about the product as the parameter.

      void deleteProduct(GamingMerchandise selectedGM)

      javafx.collections.ObservableList<GamingMerchandise> getProducts() 
      javafx.beans.property.StringProperty getTypeProperty() 
      void updateList()
      Updates the current table and product list by calling the updateList method on the view model
